FuncDef:
The nd-trigger command configures the function of triggering users to get online by NS/NA packets on a BAS interface.
The undo nd-trigger command disables the function.
By default, this function is disabled on a BAS interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When a static user or a DHCPv6 user gets offline unexpectedly, you can run the nd-trigger command on a BAS interface. After the command is run, the NE40E triggers the user to get online based on the IP packets sent by the user.
Prerequisites
The access type of the BAS interface is configured to be Layer 2 access.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
